snippet: The photographer, who shot the work of modern architects like Marcel Breuer, Eero Saarinen and Philip Johnson for magazines, is having his first career retrospective.
abstract: Pedro E Guerrero, photographer who shot the work of modern architects like Marcel Breuer, Eero Saarinen and Philip Johnson for magazines, discusses his work and upcoming career retrospective at the Woodbury Hollywood Gallery in Los Angeles.
lead_paragraph: The photographer, who shot the work of modern architects like Marcel Breuer, Eero Saarinen and Philip Johnson for magazines, is having his first career retrospective.

headline.main: Pedro E. Guerrero on Being Inspired by the Masters
headline.print_headline: Pedro E. Guerrero on Being Inspired by the Masters
